metadata.title: Wednesday, 15th February, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether all the youths who were under the Youth Internship and Apprenticeship Programme in Bwacha Parliamentary Constituency were paid their allowances, as of June, 2022;
(b) if they were not paid, why;
(c) how many youths were affected;
(d) how much money was owed to the affected youths; and
(e) when the affected youths will be paid. 118. Mr Simuzingili (Gwembe)  -  to askthe Minister of Energy:
(a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify the shores of Lake Kariba from Siavonga to Sinazongwe via Gwembe, in order to foster tourism development;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is. 119. Mr Mtayachalo (Chama North)  -  to askthe Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development:
(a) why the construction of Chibale Boarding School in Chama North Parliamentary Constituency, which is at 85% completion, has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume;
(c) what the total cost of the outstanding works is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct the Chipete-Kalasa-Kando road in Chembe District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) why the water that is supplied toKalabo Township in Kalabo District is brown in colour;
(b) whether the water is fit for human consumption; and
(c) what measures the Government is taking to make the water clear.
(a) when the TAZARA Corridor Mung’ang’a Resettlement Livestock Centre in Chief Luchembe’s Chiefdom in Kanchibiya District will be opened to the public; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in opening the Centre is.
(a) how much money Zesco Limited generated from the export of power from 2018 to 2021, year by year;
(b) whether the power is exported at cost reflective tariffs; and
(c) if the tariffs are not cost reflective, what the reasons are.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the rehabilitation of the Hoya - Kamzoole road has stalled;
(b) why the contractor has demobilised;
(c) what measures the Government is taking to ensure that the rehabilitation works are resumed and completed; and
(d) when the bridges at Mthyengu and Kamzoole, which were washed away by heavy rains, will be reconstructed.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the rehabilitation of the Msanzala Bridge in Msanzala Parliamentary Constituency has stalled; and
(b) when the project will resume.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to sink industrial boreholes at the Chambeshi Water Plant in Isoka District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) when the water tank at the Plant will be repaired. 127. Mr Simuzingili (Gwembe)  -  to askthe Minister of Health:
(a) when the Government will create a staff establishment structure for Munyumbwe Level 1 Hospital in Gwembe District; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in creating the staff establishment for the Hospital, is.
(a) when the construction of the following mini hospitals in Mungwi District will commence;
(i) Makasa; and (ii) Chimbola;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the projects is;
(c) what the cost of each project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of each project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct township roads in the following locations in Mpika Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Kamwanya; (ii) Chitulika; and (iii) Chisanga;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) when the construction of the Great North Road - TAZARA road will be completed; and
(d) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify the Chiundaponde Chiefdom in Mpika District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) when the Government will construct offices for the Department of Immigration at Chembe Border Post in Chembe District; and
(b) why the project has taken long to commence. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER (STANDING ORDER 75) W5. Mr Kasandwe (Bangweulu)  -  to ask the Minister of Local Government and Rural Development:
(a) how many feeder roads were funded for construction under the Improved Rural Connectivity Project in LuapulaProvince, from 2016 to 2021, district by district; and
(b) how many feeder roads were completed, as of December, 2021. ____________________________
